column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------   An man left a massage parlour with a bloody nose at 12:10 am on 5 June 2019. The incident occurred along 371
column5: Meanchey district.------The 50-year-old man entered 7777 massage after drinking with his friends. He then accused the female masseuse
column8: the woman claimed the man asked for sex
column9: but she refused and a fight broke out.------Cops took the two sides to settle the dispute at the administrative police station. After  a discussion they reached an unreported compromise
